title: AKDMKS : Akademiks clothing : 005 : "Flower Script"
content:
Akademiks is an NYC-based clothing company, established in 1999. I am posting a series of fonts used by Akademiks. Please help me ID the fonts.

“Flowr Script”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508004914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aka-tee-27767_6067.jpg)

005
author: dirtcastle

comments.content:
I think this might also be OptiSport Script/Spoleto.

- Mike Yanega
